rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {BHS1711, GSC1306, GSC1711}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ATS1359, BHS1711, GSC1711, PSS1711}

description: The unit introduces students to cognitive-behavioural, psychodynamic and social understandings of human behaviour. This multi-disciplinary orientation, including studies of the human mind, consciousness, emotion, and normal and abnormal behaviours, provides students with a broad and detailed introduction to understanding human behaviour.
